body_html:
You're welcome. Yesterday I followed the script on the nvidia forum thread
and got 7.5 working so now I can use pip tensor flow without problems.
On Apr 29, 2016 1:31 AM, "wangbm" notifications@github.com wrote:

WOW! It works with CUDA 7.0!
I've been trying to solve this problem for one week. You save me! Thanks!
@ktrnka https://github.com/ktrnka

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
